wikipedia_page.main: Craig Robertson (born 22 April 1963) is a Scottish former football player and coach who spent most of his career in Fife playing for Dunfermline Athletic and Raith Rovers, broken up by a spell with Aberdeen.

response: *Craig Robertson (footballer) (born 1963), Scottish former football player and coach
